## ViewportBuilderOptions.highPerformanceRendering property

Use high performance rendering mode (default: false).

**Signature:**

```typescript
highPerformanceRendering?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

When enabled, optimizes rendering for better performance with large content. This is a placeholder for future optimization features.
